1,000 Needles.Desc: The user sprays a barrage of needles at the target. Lowers the user's defense and magical defense.

Abyss Breaker.Desc: An extremely bright flash of light that illuminates the entire abyss. Has a chance to boost the user's attack and magic attack.

Acid Rain.Desc: The user performs a ritual, summoning acid rain to the battlefield. This replaces any other current weather effects.

Adrenaline.Desc: Greatly boosts the user's power and speed at the cost of health.

Aerial.Desc: The user whips up a tornado to attack all opposing Doodles. This attack has a chance to flinch.

Aero Storm.Desc: The user whips up a massive hurricane, doing massive damage. This greatly lowers the attacker's magic attack.

Agitate.Desc: The user agitates the target, causing rage.

Air Strike.Desc: Tears and shreds the enemy with compressed air. This attack has a chance to cause vulnerable.

Alloy Missiles.Desc: The user sends 3 missiles made out of various gems and minerals at the target. Each hit has a chance to lower the target's magical defense.

Allure.Desc: The user allures the target into following them around. This greatly lowers the target's speed.

Ambush.Desc: The user ambushes the target. This move never misses.

Antenna Beam.Desc: User shoots a beam from its antenna. This attack has a chance to lower the magical attack of the opponent..

Aquagel.Desc: The user surrounds themselves in a thick jelly, making them immune to Fire-type moves and curing status at the end of each turn.

Arctic Blitz.Desc: The user cloaks itself in freezing ice and charges at the target. This hurts the user a little bit.

Armor Break.Desc: The user breaks their armor, lowering their defense and magical defense stats, but greatly boosting its attack, magical attack, and speed.

Armor Up.Desc: The user conceals its weakspots, boosting its defense.

Aurora Flash.Desc: The user sends out a hypnotizing ray of light. Has a chance to confuse the target.

Bad Odor.Desc: The user uses their bad odor to lower the opposing Doodles' accuracy and evasion.

Balloon Boost.Desc: The user floats into the sky, boosting its evasion but lowering its speed.

Barb Barrier.Desc: The user protects itself for a turn with a barb barrier. If anything makes contact with the barb barrier, they take damage. Fails automatically if used in succession.

Bark.Desc: Barks aggressively, annoying the target and lowering their defense and magic defense.

Barkskin.Desc: The user fortifies its skin, greatly increasing its defense.

Belch.Desc: The user belches in the direction of the target, making them poisoned.

Berserk.Desc: The user berserks, becoming enraged and greatly boosting its attack.

Bestial Roar.Desc: User roars at the top of its lungs. This lowers the attack of the target

Bestial Wrath.Desc: User activates its inner beast to devastatingly unleash its most savage attack. Has a chance to flinch the target.

Binary Blitz.Desc: The user optimizes themself using binary, and then blitzes the target. It hurts the user a little bit.

Bite.Desc: User bites the target. Has a chance to flinch.

Blinding Lights.Desc: Blinding lights cuts the target's accuracy.

Blowup Blast.Desc: User sacrifices themselves to do a lot of damage to everyone.

Body Slam.Desc: The user crashes into the opponent with a full body slam.

Body Throw.Desc: The user picks up the target and throws it. This attack inflicts damage identical to the user's level.

Bonk.Desc: Bonks the target with its head or an object. May cause the target to flinch.

Boo!.Desc: The user attempts to scare the target. This attack inflicts damage identical to the user's level.

Boom Boom.Desc: User sacrifices themselves to do a lot of damage to everyone.

Boring Show.Desc: The user puts on a boring show, putting the target to sleep.

Branch Launch.Desc: The user launches tree branches at the target.

Bubble Shield.Desc: The user summons bubble shields around them, protecting them from attacks. If a Doodle hits them with a physical attack, the shields react by shooting a Waterbolt back.

Bullet Corn.Desc: The user shoots corn at the target. This move hits 2-5 times.

Burning Orb.Desc: The user sends a small burning orb at the target with intention to cause a burn. If it hits, cause a burn.

Cake Walk.Desc: Greatly boosts the user's highest stat.

Call of the Wild.Desc: The user calls to the wilds. For the next 5 turns, any allied Doodle that is sent out gets a random stat greatly boosted.

Calming Melody.Desc: The user whistles a calming melody, putting the target to sleep if it hits.

Capsize.Desc: The user rams into the target, intending to capsize them.

Careless Assault.Desc: The user, not caring about defense, charges into the target. This causes the user's defense and magical defense to lower.

Center of Attention.Desc: The user becomes the center of attention, making them the prime target for all the enemy's attacks. Will automatically fail if used in succession.

Chain Imprisonment.Desc: Using chains, prevents the target from escaping for 5 turns.

Challenge.Desc: The user challenges the opponents to a duel, boosting the user's attack and magical attack. The user can't switch out or flee for three turns.

Chaotic Bolt.Desc: The user gathers chaotic energy and launches at the target. This move's effect is determined by the target's status effect.

Charge.Desc: The user charges target, doing damage.

Chemical Breath.Desc: The target is hit with a blast of chemical breath. This move's type and effect changes depending on what Doodle is using it.

Chi Blast.Desc: The user charges up their chi into a ball and then shoots at the target.

Chocolate Rain.Desc: The user performs a ritual, summoning chocolate rain to the battlefield. This replaces any other current weather effects.

Choke.Desc: The user aims at the target's neck. This move always does half of the target's current health.

Claw Swipes.Desc: Swipes target. This attack hits 2-5 times.

Clumsy Swing.Desc: Swings clumsily. Lowers the evasion of the user.

Coil.Desc: The user coils up. This boosts its Attack and Speed stats as well as its accuracy.

Cold Glance.Desc: The user glares at the target with an arrogant look. It lowers the target's attack and defense.

Cold Snap.Desc: A freezing slash that cuts through the foe and has a high critical hit ratio.

Combo Support.Desc: The user gets ready to combo with its ally. The ally does more damage on its next attack.

Compost.Desc: Cures all your party's status effects.

Cone of Cold.Desc: The user attacks the target with a blast of cold air. Has a chance to freeze.

Consume Treasure.Desc: The user consumes its held item to replenish its moves and all of its health.

Counter Punch.Desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn. This move tends to go last.

Create Jelly.Desc: Creates a random Jelly for the user to hold.

Crit Up.Desc: The user boost all allies' crit chance for 5 turns.

Croak.Desc: The user croaks, boosting its magical attack.

Crocodile Tears.Desc: The user cries up a storm. This lowers the target's magic defense.

Crunch.Desc: User crunches the target. Has a chance to lower the target's defense.

Crush.Desc: The user attempts to crush down on the target. May cause vulnerability.

Crystal Armor.Desc: The user surrounds its body with crystals, greatly boosting its defense. The next attack it uses, if its Crystal-type, does more damage.

Crystal Cut.Desc: The user gets a sharp crystal and cuts the target. High chance to crit.

Crystal Dust.Desc: Splatters crystal dust at the target. Has a small chance to lower the accuracy of the target.

Crystal Storm.Desc: Summons a flurry of crystals at the target. This has a chance to lower the accuracy of the target.

Crystal Wall.Desc: The user summons a crystal wall, making the opponent's physical attacks do half damage for five turns.

Crystalized Wave.Desc: The user sends a wave of water, charged with crystals, at the target. This attack can be either Water or Crystal-type, whichever does more damage.

Curse.Desc: The user inflicts a curse on the target.

Cutesy Glare.Desc: The user glares at the target with a cute look. It greatly lowers the target's attack.

Dark Blast.Desc: Shoots a blast of darkness at a target. Has a chance to lower the target's magic defense.

Dark Slash.Desc: Imbues claws with darkness and then slashes in a criss cross pattern. Small chance to lower the target's defense.

Darkness Expansion.Desc: The user darkens the field, making Dark-type attacks do more damage and Light-type attacks do less damage.

Dirt Lump.Desc: The user casts a dirt ball at the target, doing magical damage. Lowers the target's accuracy.

Disarm.Desc: The user disarms the target, removing the target's held item. This attack does more damage if the target has an held item.

Divine Light.Desc: The user uses divine light to burn the target.

Double Bite.Desc: The user chomps on the target twice in quick succession. This move hits 2 times.

Drain Life.Desc: Using spritual energy, drains the life of the target. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Drill Sergeant.Desc: The user becomes enraged and yells at their ally to do better. The ally's attack and defense are boosted.

Earth Lance.Desc: Pointed blades shoot up from the ground. Has a chance to lower the target's defense.

Earth Surge.Desc: The user makes the ground underneath shoot up, damaging the opposing Doodles. This may lower their magical attack.

Earthquake.Desc: The user causes a powerful earthquake, doing massive damage.

Electrify.Desc: Zip zaps the target. The next time the user uses a Spark-type attack, it becomes stronger.

Electro Bite.Desc: User imbues its fangs with electricity and takes a bite at the target. Has a chance to paralyze the target.

Electro Punch.Desc: User imbues its fists with electricity and takes a punch at the target. Has a chance to paralyze the target.

Electro Slash.Desc: Imbues claws with lightning and then slashes in a criss cross pattern. Small chance to paralyze.

Empty Calories.Desc: The user feeds the target empty calories, making them diseased.

Energized.Desc: The user charges up with electricity, increasing its speed.

Enlightenment.Desc: The user realizes the secrets of the universe, increasing its magical attack and magical defense.

Entangling Vines.Desc: The user sets up entangling vines on the opponent's side. If any Doodle gets sent out onto the vines, lower their speed.

Entertain.Desc: The user entertains the target with various means. This greatly lowers their attack.

Entomophobia.Desc: The user causes the target to fear insects, doing damage to their psyche. This attack may cause confusion.

Equality.Desc: This attack move cuts down the target's health to equal the user's health.

Fast Food.Desc: Fast food. This move is certain to strike first.

Fatal Sting.Desc: User injects their stinger into the opponent. User faints on hit.

Fatten Up.Desc: The user greatly increases its Defense. The user changes its trait to Adipose, taking less damage from Fire and Ice-type attacks.

Feast.Desc: The user hosts a grand feast, healing them by half their health.

Fiery Bite.Desc: User imbues its fangs with fire and takes a bite at the target. Has a chance to burn the target.

Fiery Punch.Desc: User imbues its fists with fire and takes a punch at the target. Has a decent chance to burn the target.

Fiery Slash.Desc: Imbues claws with fire and then slashes in a criss cross pattern. Small chance to burn.

Fin Slash.Desc: The user slashes using its fin. This move has a higher chance to critical hit.

Fireball.Desc: Shoots a fire ball at the enemy. Has a chance to burn.

Firebolt.Desc: Shoots a weak fire bolt at the enemy. Has a chance to burn.

Firecracker.Desc: The user turns its body into a literal firework. It hurts the user for the same amount of damage that it does.

FirewallFirebolt.Desc: Shoots a weak fire bolt at the enemy.

Flame Rattle.Desc: The user shoots a flame from its rattle, doing damage. Does even more damage if the target is frozen or burned.

Flame Shield.Desc: The user summons fire shields around them, protecting them from attacks. If a Doodle hits them with a magic attack, the shields react by shooting a Firebolt back.

Flames of Gehenna.Desc: The user summons flames from Gehenna, heavily causing harm to the target. Causes damage to the target at the end of each turn until they switch out.

Flare.Desc: A bright flare that greatly lowers the target's evasiveness. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Flash Freeze.Desc: The user freezes the air around the target, causing massive damage and greatly lowering the target's speed.

Flashbang.Desc: The user surprises the target with sudden light and makes the target flinch. It only works on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

Flashing Strike.Desc: The user shines a light, and then strikes. This move never misses.

Flurry.Desc: Jabs the target repeatedly. This attack hits 2-4 times.

Focus.Desc: The user focuses, enabling it to hit its next move regardless of the target's evasiveness. Also enables Basic and Melee-type moves to hit Spirit types.

Food Fight.Desc: Summons food to throw. May lower the target's accuracy.

Food Poisoning.Desc: The user stabs the target, trying to change their molecular structure. If the target is Food-type, this attack does double damage.

Foreign Substance.Desc: The user lobs a substance from another universe at the target, making the target diseased.

Forest Fire.Desc: This move does double damage to Plant types.

Foxfire.Desc: After damaging the opponent, cures a random party member's status effects.

Frenzied Darkness.Desc: The user frenzies under the guise of darkness, inflicting Vulnerable.

Frostbite.Desc: The user gives Frostbite to the opposing team. If it hits, it causes damage at the end of each turn until they switch out.

Frostgrip.Desc: Grips the foe with a chilling freeze and has a chance of lowering the target's defense.

Gem Blast.Desc: The user blasts the target with an assortment of gems. Has a very high chance to raise the user's magical attack.

Geode Smash.Desc: The user conjures geodes to send at the target.

Glancing Blow.Desc: The user does a non-lethal strike at the target. The target is left with at least 1 health.

Glaze Punch.Desc: User imbues its fists with glaze and takes a punch at the target. Has a chance to lower the target's accuracy.

Gleeful Ruse.Desc: The user damages the target, and then tries to trades items.

Glimmer Wing.Desc: The user becomes pure light and then smashes into the foe. It heals for 1/2 of the damage inflicted.

Glow Up.Desc: The user glows up, greatly boosting its magic attack.

Goo Blast.Desc: Launches a ball of unsanitary goo at the target. This has a chance of poisoning.

Harden.Desc: The user hardens its body, boosting its defense.

Harmony.Desc: The user attempts to sing a harmonic song to put the target to sleep.

Haste.Desc: The user adopts a more agile-stance, greatly increasing its speed.

Haunt.Desc: The user disappears using its spiritual form, and then reappears near the target, scaring them. Has a chance to curse the target.

Headbutt.Desc: User headbutts the target. Has a chance to flinch.

Heal.Desc: Using magic, the user restores half their health.

Heat Bash.Desc: User strikes the enemy with intense heat. Chance to burn.

Heckle.Desc: Hurls food at the target. Has a chance to lower the defense of the target.

Helicopter Kick.Desc: A spinning kick. This attack hits 2-5 times.

Hemlock Hit.Desc: The user attacks with poisonous plants. Has a 30% chance to poison.

Hex.Desc: Casts a spell on the target that does more damage if the target has a status effect.

Hexblade.Desc: A strike that does more damage if the target has a status effect.

Hide.Desc: The user hides, boosting its evasion but lowering its accuracy.

Hiss.Desc: The user hisses at the opponent Doodles, making them afraid to attack. This lowers their attack and magic attack.

Hit-n-Run.Desc: The user attacks the target, and then quickly returns back to its owner to switch places with a party Doodle.

Hop.Desc: The user hops into the target.

Hope Beacon.Desc: The user emits a beacon of light to replenish its other moves and a third of its maximum health.

Howl.Desc: The user howls, boosting its attack.

Hydro Burst.Desc: The user launches its most powerful Water attack. Has a chance to lower the target's magic defense.

Hype Up.Desc: The user hypes up their ally. The ally's attack and magic attack are boosted.

Hyper Scream.Desc: The user screams at the top of its lungs, doing massive damage. Has a chance to cause flinch.

Hyper Voice.Desc: The user sends soundwaves at the opposing team.

Ice Prison.Desc: Lowers the target's speed and prevents them from switching out for 3-5 turns.

Icy Bite.Desc: User imbues its fangs with ice and takes a bite at the target. Has a chance to freeze the target.

Icy Floor.Desc: The user turns the field into ice, sometimes causing attackers to miss their attacks.

Icy Slash.Desc: Imbues claws with ice and then slashes in a criss cross pattern. Small chance to freeze.

Icy Tackle.Desc: The user encases themselves in ice and rams the target.

Icy Veil.Desc: The user summons an icy veil, preventing your side from being inflicted with status conditions for five turns.

Incinerate.Desc: The user burns the target's held item, removing it. This attack does more damage if the target has an held item.

Infection.Desc: The user attempts to infect the opposing team with a deadly disease. If the target is poisoned, replace the Poison with Diseased.

Inflame.Desc: The user internally heats up, boosting its magic attack. If the user has a status effect, greatly boost the user's magic attack instead.

Insect Instinct.Desc: If the target is going to switch out, the user sharpens its mandibles/stinger and adopts a battle-ready stance, boosting the user's attack, speed, and accuracy.

Insult.Desc: The user insults the target, causing them to rage.

Intangible.Desc: The user becomes intangible. It dodges every other attack. This move always goes last.

Iron Chomp.Desc: User chomps down on the target with a force strong enough to crush steel.

Iron Slash.Desc: The user slashes with its steel-hard claws in a criss cross pattern. Small chance to cause vulnerable.

Itchy Bite.Desc: It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

Jealousy.Desc: If the user doesn't have an item, boost its attack and speed. Otherwise, no effect.

Jet Strike.Desc: The user unexpectedly soars through the sky, causing damage. This move is certain to strike first.

Jolly Dance.Desc: The user does a happy jig, increasing its defense and magic defense.

Just Desserts.Desc: This attack does double damage if the user has less than half health.

Landslide.Desc: The user causes a giant landslide, doing massive damage to all opposing doodles. Has a chance to flinch.

Laser.Desc: A weak laser attacks the target.

Lava Toss.Desc: User tosses lava at the enemy. High chance to burn.

Leaf Blade.Desc: The user uses a leaf as a weapon and attacks by slicing. High chance to crit.

Leaf Sap.Desc: Shoots a nutrient-sucking leaf at the target. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Leaf Tornado.Desc: The user summons a tornado with leaves, doing massive damage. This greatly lowers the attacker's magic attack.

Lick.Desc: The user licks the target with its tongue, having a chance to lower the target's attack.

Life Roots.Desc: The user plants its life-healing roots in the ground. At the end of each turn, it heals health.

Life Sap.Desc: Saps the life of the target. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Life-Ender.Desc: A high-powered move that fails if it isn't used by Kowosu.

Lightning Kicks.Desc: The user rapidly kicks the target while infused with lighting. This move hits 2-5 times.

Lightspeed Flurry.Desc: The user jabs a bunch of times at lightspeed. This move is certain to strike first.

Lingering Poison.Desc: The user sets up poison on the opponent's side. If any Doodle gets sent out into the poison, they get poisoned.

Magical Shield.Desc: The user summons a magical shield, making the opponent's magical attacks do half damage for five turns.

Mandible Wound.Desc: The ultimate insect move. The user, with its mandible or jaws, does massive damage.

Marking Bite.Desc: A biting attack that marks the target if it hits.

Meditation.Desc: The user enters in a state of deep focus, greatly boosting its magic defense.

Mend.Desc: The user mends itself, resetting any negative stat changes the user has.

Mind Drain.Desc: Drains the target's mind. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Mind Empowerment.Desc: The user empowers its mind, greatly boosting its magical attack.

Mind Power.Desc: Attacks using weak telekinesis. Has a small chance to confuse.

Mineral Cannon.Desc: The user gathers all minerals around it and releases them at the target. It may also lower the target's defense.

Misery.Desc: User wallows in its own misery, greatly boosting its magic attack.

Misery Dance.Desc: The user does a strange, sad dance, greatly increasing its defense.

Mud Spit.Desc: The user spits mud at the target, doing magical damage. Lowers the target's accuracy.

Multi-Hit.Desc: The user hits the enemy multiple times. This move hits 2-5 times.

Multi-Smack.Desc: Smacks the target repeatedly. This attack hits 2-5 times.

Murmur.Desc: Inflicts a random status effect on the target.

Mutiny.Desc: The user convinces the target to mutiny its tamer with it. If it hits, both the user and the target become enraged (curing any other status effects), and the user greatly gains speed.

Mythic Blast.Desc: An ancient attack from long ago.

Nature's Guardian.Desc: The user is protected by a nature's guardian. If a Doodle hits them with a contact move, has a chance to boost all of their stats.

Necromancy.Desc: Does more damage the more fainted Doodles in your party. Hits all opposing doodles.

Needle Spike.Desc: The user shoots spikes at the target.

Nibble.Desc: The user chews at the opponent with its mandibles or teeth.

Night Night.Desc: This attack does double damage if the target is asleep.

Nose Dive.Desc: The user dive bombs the target. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

Nutrient Drain.Desc: Saps the nutrients from the target. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Panhandle.Desc: The user begs for money. Only works one time per battle.

Paralysis Spores.Desc: The user scatters spores that paralyzes the target.

Parasitic Seeds.Desc: The user sends parasitic seeds at the target. At the end of each turn, those seeds steals health from the target.

Party!.Desc: The user convinces the opposing team to party with it. This creates an opening, lowering their defense and magical defense.

Patchwork.Desc: The user uses thread to tie up the foe and trip them, drastically lowering their speed.

Pebble.Desc: User throws a pebble at the target.

Peck.Desc: Pecks the enemy with a beak.

Pickpocket.Desc: The user steals the opponent's item.

Piercing Ice.Desc: User pierces the target's defense with icicles. This move ignores any stat changes the target has.

Piercing Poke.Desc: This move bypasses moves such as Protect. If the target is using a move such as Protect, this move does double damage and also lifts the effect of Protect.

Pirouette.Desc: The user spins and attacks. This attack always does 40 damage.

Plant Sap.Desc: Uses plants to sap the life of the target. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Playtime's Over.Desc: This attack does more damage the longer the user is in battle. After attacking, all stat changes are reset.

Poison Gas.Desc: The user creates poison gas, trying to make the opposing team poisoned.

Poison Ivy.Desc: The user attempts to poison the target with a tackle.

Poison Punch.Desc: User imbues its fists with poison and takes a punch at the target. Has a chance to poison the target.

Poison Spores.Desc: The user scatters spores that causes poison.

Preparation.Desc: The user prepares its next attack. The next time the user attacks, it does more damage.

Primal Rage.Desc: The user activates its primal rage. Beast-type attacks do more damage.

Protect.Desc: The user protects itself from the next attack. Fails automatically if used in succession.

Psychic Ram.Desc: The user covers itself with psychic energy and attacks. Has a chance to flinch.

Psychoforce.Desc: The user releases a shockwave of psychic power. This move has a chance to lower the target's magic defense.

Psychokinetic Launch.Desc: The user, using its mind, launches objects at the target. This move does physical damage.

Pummel.Desc: The user pummels the target. Has a chance to lower the attack of the opponent.

Pumpkin Spin.Desc: The user spins around in a pumpkin. This clears hazards on their side of the field.

Pure Fear.Desc: Projects raw terror into the enemy, forcing them to flinch on their next move. This move always attacks last.

Purge.Desc: The user purges all stat changes, resetting them.

Purl Stitch.Desc: The user attempts to stitch the opponent together. This move hits 3-4 times.

Pursuit.Desc: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a foe that is switching out of battle or running away.

Quad Strike.Desc: Strikes the target with multiple lightning bolts. This attack hits 4 times.

Quick Ice.Desc: The user shoots chunks of ice at the target. This move is certain to strike first.

Quick Sting.Desc: The user haphazardly rushes toward the target with its stinger. This move is certain to strike first.

Quick Strike.Desc: The user attacks quickly. This move always goes first.

Quick Thinking.Desc: This Doodle is quick to react in times of duress, boosting their magical attack and speed.

Radiant Beam.Desc: The user shines an extremely bright beam at the target. The target's accuracy also lowers.

Rage Spores.Desc: The user scatters spores that causes the target to rage.

Raging Bonfire.Desc: A rampaging bonfire attack. It hurts the user a little bit.

Rainmaker.Desc: The user performs a ritual, summoning rain to the battlefield. This replaces any other weather effects.

Rapid Current.Desc: The user summons a current to gains speed. If it's raining, drastically increase its speed instead.

Reckless Charge.Desc: The user charges head-first into the target. It hurts the user a little bit.

Recombobulate.Desc: The user recombobulates both it and a target. Boosts a random stat of the user and lowers a random stat of the target.

Relief.Desc: The user patches up the target, healing them by half their health.

Rest.Desc: The user goes to sleep, restoring all its health and curing any statuses.

Retribution.Desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn. This move tends to go last.

Reverse Singularity.Desc: The user changes the laws of physics, causing slower Doodles to go first for 5 turns.

Revitalize.Desc: If the user would faint, restore their health by half. This attack only works once per battle.

Rip Current.Desc: The user unexpectedly rips the current, causing damage. This move is certain to strike first.

Roll.Desc: The user rolls into the enemy, doing damage.

Roundhouse Kick.Desc: The user spins around and kicks, aiming to lower the opponent's speed.

Royal Ice.Desc: The user protects itself for a turn with an ice shield. If anything makes contact with the ice shield, their attack gets greatly lowered. Fails automatically if used in succession.

Rumbling Charge.Desc: The user charges at the target while causing the earth to rumble. This attack boosts the user's speed stat.

Rupture.Desc: The user summons precious gems to burst from the ground underneath a target, dealing large amounts of damage. This greatly lowers the user's magical attack.

Rust.Desc: Water is sprayed at the target. If the target is Metal-type, it does extra damage.

Rusty Roots.Desc: User attacks using old roots. Has a chance to lower the target's accuracy.

Sad Zone.Desc: The user makes the target sad. It lowers the target's defense and magical defense.

Sakura Blast.Desc: A spiral of cherry blossoms strikes. Has a chance to confuse the target.

Sandstorm.Desc: The user performs a ritual, summoning a sandstorm to the battlefield. This replaces any other current weather effects.

Savage Blow.Desc: The user attacks the target with no regards to etiquette. This may lower the defense of the target.

Scapegoat.Desc: Sacrificing some health, the user creates a training dummy. The dummy serves as the user's scapegoat, taking attacks for them.

Screech.Desc: The user makes an extremely annoying sound at the target. This greatly lowers their defense.

Scrutinize.Desc: The user scrutinizes the opposing team with a scary look that lowers the Defense stat.

Seasoning.Desc: The user sprinkles seasoning on the opposing team. Food-types do more damage to targets that have seasoning on the target.

Sedimentary Defense.Desc: User gathers sediments to surround its body, greatly boosting its defense but greatly lowering its magical defense. If there's a sandstorm, magical defense isn't lowered.

Seed Assault.Desc: The user assaults the target with seeds. Has a chance to flinch.

Shadow Lurk.Desc: The user lurks in the shadows, and then ambushes the target. This move always goes first.

Shadowbolt.Desc: Shoots a weak shadow bolt at the enemy.

Shadowstep.Desc: The user steps through the shadows, boosting its speed and crit chance.

Shadowy Eyes.Desc: A ghastly glare to scare the target. Has a chance to flinch.

Shale.Desc: If there's a sandstorm, the user summons a wall made of shale, making the opponent's super-effective attacks do half damage for five turns.

Shard Surge.Desc: The user sends a wave of water, charged with crystals, at the target. This attack can be either Water or Crystal-type, whichever does more damage.

Sharpen.Desc: The user sharpens its claws or weapons, greatly boosting their attack.

Shatter.Desc: The user shatters the earth beneath the target, breaking any Magical Shields, Crystal Walls, or Shales.

Shell Crash.Desc: The user crashes it shell into the target. Has a chance to lower the target's attack.

Shellshock.Desc: The user attacks using its shell. Has a chance to paralyze.

Shield Bash.Desc: User bashes the target with its shield or armor. This attack uses the user's defense stat to calculate damage.

Shifting Winds.Desc: The user uses winds to cleanse hazards from both sides of the field, and boost their speed.

Shock.Desc: Shocks the target. Has a chance to paralyze.

Shock Therapy.Desc: Heals the user and cures any statuses it has.

Shock Wave.Desc: The user creates a shock wave, doing damage to all other Doodles.

Siphon Soul.Desc: Steals a portion of the soul of the target. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Siren Song.Desc: The user sings an old sailor-tune with malicious intent, doing damage and having a chance to put the target to sleep.

Sizzle.Desc: This attack has a chance to burn. If the target is Food-type, this attack has a 100% chance to burn.

Skitter.Desc: The user skitters on its many legs to boost its speed and accuracy.

Slash and Burn.Desc: The user uses a leaf as a weapon, sets it on fire, and then attacks. Has a 30% chance to burn.

Sleep n' Steal.Desc: The user tries to puts the enemy to sleep, and if it does, removes their held item.

Sleep Spores.Desc: The user scatters spores that induces sleep.

Smack.Desc: Smacks target with its body or hands.

Smokescreen.Desc: Covers the user in a smokescreen, boosting its evasion.

Snack Chomp.Desc: User chomps on the target as if they were a snack.

Snow Fort.Desc: User makes a snowfort, greatly boosting its defense.

Sob.Desc: The user reminiscences how it became a spirit and starts sobbing. This move lowers all the stats of the target.

Solid Charge.Desc: User assumes a defensive stance and then charges at the opponent. This attack uses the user's defense stat to calculate damage.

Sonata of Darkness.Desc: A melody that is banned in many countries. It causes any Doodle to hear this song to faint in 3 turns, unless it switches out of battle.

Soulfire.Desc: Burn the target's soul. If the target is cursed, do double damage.

Sparkling Finish.Desc: The user takes time to polish away any dirt and feel good, boosting speed and accuracy.

Spicy Tackle.Desc: User charges at target while smelling delicious. This move can't miss.

Spirit Claws.Desc: The user attacks using its spiritual energy. This move has a higher chance to critical hit.

Spirit Orb.Desc: Gathers spiritual energy to attack the target. Has a chance to lower the magic defense of the target.

Squeak.Desc: The user squeaks, trying to gain sympathy points. The opposing team's attack are lowered.

Stab.Desc: Stabs target with a pointy object or weapon.

Stalactites.Desc: The user causes stalacities to fall from the ceiling. This move hits 2-5 times.

Starbreaker.Desc: This move does more damage the less stars the user has.

Storm Heal.Desc: The user uses the power of the ocean to heal itself by a quarter of their health. If it is raining, heals them by half instead.

Subterfuge.Desc: The user launches a surprise attack and makes the target flinch. It only works on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

Sugar Kiss.Desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, sugary kiss. Has a chance to confuse the target.

Sugar Rush.Desc: The user charges, amped up on sugar, intending to take the target down. This may make the target flinch.

Sulfur Plume.Desc: An eruption of toxic sulfur gas, decreasing the user's defense and magical defense after use. Has a high chance to poison the target.

Swaddle.Desc: The user swaddles the target in a bunch of bandages, lowering their attack and speed.

Swagger Dance.Desc: The user does a strange dance, increasing its defense, magic defense, and speed.

Swarm.Desc: Does more damage the more insect Doodles in your party. Hits all opposing doodles.

Sweet Aroma.Desc: The user sends out a sweet aroma, lowering the opposing team's evasiveness.

Swift Hook.Desc: The user attacks with a swift jab. This move is certain to strike first.

Swift Shield.Desc: The user shields itself and its allies from priority moves.

Sword Sweep.Desc: Slashing their sword, this attack does massive damage to all opposing doodles. Has a high chance to lower the target's defense.

Sylphid.Desc: The user creates a wind barrier, speeding up all allies for 5 turns.

Tainted Water.Desc: Summons a wave of dirty water at the opposing team that can poison. If it's raining, this attack always poisons.

Takeout.Desc: The user attacks the target, and then quickly returns back to its owner to switch places with a party Doodle.

Taser.Desc: The user shoots a low amperage bolt at the target. If it hits the target, it paralyzes them.

Taunt.Desc: The target is provoked into only using attack moves for three turns.

Tempest.Desc: The user whips up a storm intended to clear the skies of all weather.

Testing Move.Desc: A move only used to test stuff.

The World.Desc: The other side can't attack next turn. This move only works once per battle, and always goes last.

Thunder Strike.Desc: Summons a lightning bolt to strike the target. Has a chance to paralyze.

Thunderstorm.Desc: Summons a giant lightning bolt to strike the foe. Has a high chance to paralyze.

Tidal Slam.Desc: Rides a tidal wave to slam into the target. Has a chance to flinch.

Toughen.Desc: The user adapts a battle-ready stance and boosts their attack and defense.

Tourniquet.Desc: Cures all your party's status effects.

Toxic Bomb.Desc: The user sends a deadly poison orb at the opposing team. This attack does double damage on poisoned or diseased targets.

Trade.Desc: The user convinces the target to trade held items.

Trait Exchange.Desc: The user trades traits with the target.

Trap.Desc: The user traps the target and prevents them from escaping for 3-5 turns.

Tri-Elemental Slash.Desc: Once this move is used, this move's type turns into a Fire, Ice, or Spark-type move, cycling through them.

Tsunami.Desc: Summons a tsunami, sending it at all other doodles.

Tsunami Drop.Desc: The user picks up the target with a tsunami and then slams them into the ground. This attack does more damage the heavier the opponent.

Unguarded Strike.Desc: The user foregoes defense to attack the opponent. This move lowers the defenses of the user.

Vague Vortex.Desc: The user summons a vortex of an unknown origin. Has a chance to confuse.

Vampiric Strike.Desc: The user strikes with vampiric energy. Restores the user for half the damage done.

Venom Bite.Desc: User imbues its fangs with venom and takes a bite at the target. Has a chance to poison the target.

Venom Lacerate.Desc: Imbues claws or a weapon with poison and then lacerates in a criss cross pattern. Small chance to poison.

Venomous Sting.Desc: Stings the target with a poisonous barb. Has a high chance to poison.

Waterbolt.Desc: Shoots a weak water bolt at the enemy.

Wave Shot.Desc: The user sends a wave that damages the opposing team that cleanses hazards from both sides of the field.

Web.Desc: The user covers the target in a web, lowering their speed.

Web Ball.Desc: User shoots a web ball at the target. This attack has a chance to lower the speed of the opponent.

Whisper.Desc: Draws foe in with spooky whispers. Lowers the evasion of the target.

Wide Shield.Desc: The user shields itself and its allies from multi-target moves.

Wild Growth.Desc: Summons plants to attack the target. May boost all of the user's stats.

Wind Shear.Desc: The user beats its wings at a blinding winds, creating a damaging surge of wind. The power of this attack move is doubled if the target hasn't attacked yet this turn.

Wing Slash.Desc: The user slashes using its wings. This move has a higher chance to critical hit.

Worthwhile Sacrifice.Desc: The user sacrifices themselves to greatly lower the attack and magical attack of the target.

Wrap.Desc: User wraps its body around the target, preventing them from escaping.

Yarn Snare.Desc: The user sets up a yarn snare on the opponent's side. If any Doodle gets sent out onto the yarn snare, the snare lowers its attack.

Zeppelin Zap.Desc: The user gathers electricity and zaps the target. May boost the user's magical attack.
